actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the project for Ashtabula Harbor, Ohio, to authorize the enlargement of a turning basin.

summary.text: Modifies the Ashtabula Harbor, Ohio, navigation project to authorize the enlargement of the turning basin known as area G by extending it eastward for up to 500 feet and northward to within 150 feet of the east breakwater.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for Ashtabula Harbor, Ohio, to authorize the enlargement of a turning basin.
